Text: Cindy Olson saidthat you respond to emails I just wanted to let you know that while I am angry and upset over what is going on I think you have been terrific I feel you are a victim of things that have gone on as are some of the rest of us I have enjoyed very much working for Enron and had planned on this being where I continued my employment it is a terrific place to work Ive been looking at positions outside of Enron though This is not due to Enron this is due to my preference in management I just wanted you to know Good luck Ginger Sinclair

REPST These are ready for pick up at the receptionist desk on the th floor of the Enron North Ginger Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Tuesday January PM To Sinclair Ginger Subject Ginger Jeanie Slone informed me that you would be able to help get my last two pay stubs I am in need of these in order to get a new work visa and any help you could offer would be greatly appreciated Thank you Jon

RE Rob Benson Pay StubPST Our emails must be crossing it is ready for pick up on the th floor of the Enron North Building Original Message From Benson Robert Sent Tuesday January PM To Sinclair Ginger Subject Rob Benson Pay Stub Hi Ginger its Rob again just wondering if you had any luck with my last two pay stubs Sorry to bother you but the people looking after my work visa need it by tomorrow Thanks Rob Benson

RE Rob Benson Pay StubPST These are available at the receptionist desk on the th floor of Enron Building North Ginger Original Message From Benson Robert Sent Tuesday January PM To Sinclair Ginger Subject Rob Benson Pay Stub Hi Ginger I need a copy of my last pay stubs in order to get my work visa stuff started If you could please send me a copy Thank you very much Robert Benson

Tax Structural Analysis EBCfor Organizational Restructure Modifications to aleviate the tax burden to employees as they change companies For those who need to call into the conference room please call and you access code is If you are unable to attend please have someone represent you
